title: Coffee Meets Bagel says recent outage caused by destructive cyberattack
description: The Coffee Meets Bagel dating platform confirms last week's outage was caused by hackers breaching the company's systems and deleting company data. [...]

title: Atlas VPN zero-day vulnerability leaks users' real IP address
description: An Atlas VPN zero-day vulnerability affecting the Linux client leaks a user's real IP address simply by visiting a website. [...]

title: Crypto casino Stake.com loses $41 million to hot wallet hackers
description: Online cryptocurrency casino Stake.com announced that its ETH/BSC hot wallets had been compromised to perform unauthorized transactions, with over $40 million in crypto reportedly stolen. [...]

title: Chaes malware now uses Google Chrome DevTools Protocol to steal data
description: The Chaes malware has returned as a new, more advanced variant that includes a custom implementation of the Google DevTools protocol for direct access to the victim's browser functions, allowing it to steal data using WebSockets. [...]

title: ASUS routers vulnerable to critical remote code execution flaws
description: Three critical-severity remote code execution vulnerabilities impact ASUS RT-AX55, RT-AX56U_V2, and RT-AC86U routers, potentially allowing threat actors to hijack devices if security updates are not installed. [...]

title: Continuous Security: PTaaS Bridges the Gap within Application Security
description: How do you choose between Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS) or traditional web application pen testing? Learn more from Outpost24 on the differences between both pentesting methods. [...]
